title: 204-Russian Folklore: Get in the Bag
itunes:title: 204-Russian Folklore: Get in the Bag
description:
We're back in Russian folklore for a fun story about a soldier with some biscuits who fights demons, heaven, and yes, death itself.

The creature is the valravn and I just can't get over how cool that name is.

--

“Lochley Fells” by Blue Dot Sessions

“March on Gumdrop Field” by Blue Dot Sessions
